gov.niarl.his.privacyca

Class TpmSymCaAttestation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.niarl.his.privacyca.TpmSymCaAttestation

  • public class TpmSymCaAttestation
extends Object

    This class is for the TCG's TPM_SYM_CA_ATTESTATION structure.

    Author:
    schawki

      • encrypt

        public TpmSymmetricKey encrypt(int algMode,
                      short encScheme,
                      boolean TrousersModeIV,
                      boolean TrousersModeSymkeyEncscheme)
                        throws IOException,
                               NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                               NoSuchPaddingException,
                               InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                               InvalidKeyException,
                               IllegalBlockSizeException,
                               BadPaddingException,
                               PrivacyCaException
        Encrypt the stored certificate using the specified options. A random key and IV are created.
        Parameters:
        algMode - Not used. This parameter is left here to maintain compatibility. This value is hard coded to TPM_ALG_AES.
        encScheme - Not used. This parameter is left here to maintain compatibility. This value is hard coded to TPM_ES_CBC_PKCS5PAD.
        TrousersModeIV - Set to TRUE to use a TrouSerS-style initialization vector placement.
        TrousersModeSymkeyEncscheme - Set to TRUE to set the encryption scheme to TPM_ES_NONE. (Not all versions of TrouSerS use this scheme, but the only ones available in RedHat Yum repositories do.)
        Returns:
        The symmetric key used to encrypt the certificate in the form of a TpmSymmetricKey. The encrypted certificate itself is retrieved in raw byte format by running the toByteArray() function.
        Throws:
        IOException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException
        NoSuchPaddingException
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        InvalidKeyException
        IllegalBlockSizeException
        BadPaddingException
        PrivacyCaException

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray()
                   throws TpmUtils.TpmUnsignedConversionException
        Serialize the structure.
        Returns:
        A byte array form of the TpmSymCaAttestation structure.
        Throws:
        TpmUtils.TpmUnsignedConversionException
